title: Hotel Deal of the Week: The Gleneagle Hotel & Apartments, Killarney
text:
The Gleneagle Hotel & Apartments, Killarney, Co. Kerry
FUN FOR ALL AGES: €99pps midweek or €119pps weekends – 2 nights Bed & Breakfast with Dinner on one evening. Includes nightly entertainment.
This is a midweek and weekend offer, valid until 15 November 2015.
www.gleneaglehotel.com
